description:
[h1][b]Protects (parts of) your creations against explosives, getting out of the world, your friends and much more![/b][/h1]

Will get more features soon when I have more time.

[b]Warning:[/b] Currently it only protects the body that it is placed on. Everything you connect to a bearing, piston, suspension or other joint will not be protected! Place a Scrap Guard on that body to protect it too.
name: Scrap Guard
